scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn cache clean && yarn
scripts.test:v1.0.1.mainnet: yarn mainnetForkSetup; FORK_CHAIN_ID=$MAINNET_CHAIN_ID FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER=$MAINNET_FORK_BLOCK_NUMBER FORK_RPC_URL=$MAINNET_RPC_URL FORK_ENABLED=true DEPLOY=mainnet hardhat node --no-reset --network hardhat
